scripts.package:win: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/ngx-electron-starter $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=win32 --arch=all --overwrite --asar
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/ngx-electron-starter $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=linux --arch=all --overwrite --asar
scripts.package:osx: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/ngx-electron-starter $npm_package_name --out=packages --platform=darwin --arch=all --overwrite --app-bundle-id=ngx.electron.starter --helper-bundle-id=ngx.electron.starter.helper --app-version=0.0.1 --build-version=0.0.1 --asar
scripts.package:all: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/ngx-electron-starter $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --all --arch=all --overwrite --asar
